# Shortcut project rationale

### Principles
1. Easy to remember
2. Easy to type (flow)
3. Easy to transfer
4. Based on intuition and/or grammatical concepts

### Concepts
1. Noun
2. Adjective
3. Verb
4. Adverb

##### Examples

<details> 
<summary>Environment</summary>
Environmentalism
Environmental
Environmentally
</details>

@
"#

^
&

[]
{}
.
/
;
: 


#### Noun is "noun"

#### SubString from noun is "noun.substring"

#### Verb is ;verb

#### State is [state
    for example, [envr = environmentalism
